description:
In his defeat of Usui, Saito exposes the blind warrior`s plot to kill Shishio. And while Kaoru, Yahiko and Misao are preparing to defend themselves from an ambush, Kenshin readies for his fight against Aoshi.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kurt, Kalbin Gözünü Yok Ediyor: Gatotsu`nun Vahşi Saldırısı
O Lobo Que Caçou os Olhos de Uma Alma
Shingan o Toraeta Ookami: Sakuretsu Suru Gatotsu Zero Shiki!
สุนัขจิ้งจองตาทิพย์ระเบิดพลังแรงแค้น
心眼をとらえた狼・炸裂する牙突零式!
